content.welcome: With Shelfie you can now finally have access to your past. We digitize your tapes, you get to carry around your nostalgic videos in your pocket.

errors.passwordsDontMatchDescription: Please make sure to enter the same new password twice

welcome.intro: Your video tapes on your iPhone
